q: sale next year. The company also is working on natural gas vehicles and will lead the field in offering 8- and 9-speed transmissions, designed for use with hybrids, in a wide range of vehicles. By 2013 we will have one of the most fuel-efficient fleets, Sergio Marchionne said Wednesday in announcing a demonstration fleet of up to 20 hydraulic hybrid Chrysler Town& Country minivans. Fuel economy on the minivans should improve 60 percent in city driving and 30 percent to 35 percent overall.

a defense that is ranked fifth overall in the NFL. Led by defensive player-of-the-year favorite Clay Matthews with 13 1/2 sacks, the Packers are tied for second behind the Steelers in bringing down quarterbacks. Those guys fly around the ball and are always in good position, Michael Vick said of the Packers' defense. "You just have to be ready for what they're going to do. They give you a lot of different looks and try to confuse you."

LOS ANGELES( AP)-- Simon Cowell wants his American version of "The X Factor" to include controversy, vocal groups, not just soloists, and maybe, Paula Abdul as a judge. Simon Cowell says he's spoken to her, she knows I'm a big fan. He adds he's "always said at some point we are going to be working together." But, he says he has "to take everyone's opinions into account" including the show's other producers

However the former Pentagon chief also admitted his biggest error during his tenure under President Bush was his failure to convince the president to accept his resignation in the wake of the Abu Ghraib prison scandal. That was such a stain on our country. To think that people in our custody were treated in that disgusting and perverted and ghastly way- unacceptable way, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News anchor Diane Sawyer .
